alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 14 at 8:58AM EST until January 14 at 9:30AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Eastern Tioga County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 930 AM EST. * At 857 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Caton to Buttonwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from west of Mansfield to the Bradford county line. Route 15 from near Liberty to Lawrenceville. State Road 14 from Roaring Branch to the Bradford County line. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Blossburg, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Ogdensburg, Tioga, Liberty, Roseville, Tioga Junction, and Mansfield University. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
